snippet.title: RE:SPACED Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
The Eclipse Space Station suddenly got invaded by aliens and you are the only one left behind! Your mission? Survive and escape! Grab your gun and venture through different rooms while defeating enemies and use your guns recoil to jump to higher up places!

ReSpaced can now be downloaded on Steam for free!
